title: Goals
subtitle: Here you can keep track of your goals.

alert.title: Important
alert.text: When you add your goals in the total sum of the weights it should give a 100% total
alert.warning: Remember that the total weight of the objectives must add up to a total of 100%, you can increase one of the weights or add another objective.
alert.error: Error, the total of the weights adds more than what is allowed, remember that it must add a total of 100%.
alert.ruleValidation: Check the entered value, possibly there is an error.
